author: mrmitch
title: Simple set with figure for affordable price
review: I picked up this set for around $5.00 US, and makes a nice addition to our small DUPLO collection. Car is very sturdy and can be used(abused) by toddlers. Like the hose to fill up other cars in Duplo Town. Good solid set, fits in nice with Duplo towns, I may be wrong but there is not a wide selection of vehicles available in the recent Duplo sets.

author: modena
title: Great accessory!
review:
I don't know when I got this set, but I remember playing with it. It is my only tank truck!

Pros

  • Runs on Duplo tracks!
  • Flexible hose!
  • Minifig logo matches to truck!

Cons

  • Easy to build.

Overall:

This seemed like it was a nice set when I was little. You can see that it has many pros. What is most interesting is that it is compatible with Duplo tracks. The only con will not apply very much to small kids.

Overall, nice set, great for little kids.
